name: Boring Desert in My Pocket (Demo version)
name_original: Boring Desert in My Pocket (Demo version)
description: One night I was trying to come up with some new projects so I went to an online random video game name generator. One of the titles it spit out was Boring Desert in My Pocket and well, that resonated with me, so I started developing it in GB Studio. This is the first demo version of it.
